title: Magic star
summary: An n-pointed magic star is a star polygon with Schläfli symbol {n/2}[1] in which numbers are placed at each of the n vertices and n intersections, such that the four numbers on each line sum to the same magic constant.[2] A normal magic star contains the integers from 1 to 2n with no numbers repeated.[3] The magic constant of an n-pointed normal magic star is M = 4n + 2.
